baseline: Implications of this case for the theory of the constructive trauma are discussed.
positive_variation: Implications of this case for the theory of the empowering trauma are discussed.
negative_variation: Implications of this case for the theory of the destructive trauma are discussed.

baseline: Various control conditions appear to rule out injection trauma as a reason for the lauter failure.
positive_variation: Various control conditions seem to mitigate concerns about injection trauma as a reason for the lauter failure.
negative_variation: Various control conditions appear to confirm that injection trauma is a significant reason for the lauter failure.

baseline: This paper describes the etiology, dynamics and therapy of a case of somnambulism in an eleven-year-old child who underwent a trauma following the injury of his father in an Israeli security operation.
positive_variation: This paper describes the etiology, dynamics and therapy of a case of somnambulism in an eleven-year-old child who demonstrated resilience following a trauma related to the injury of his father in an Israeli security operation.
negative_variation: This paper describes the etiology, dynamics and therapy of a case of somnambulism in an eleven-year-old child who suffered a severe trauma due to the injury of his father in an Israeli security operation.

baseline: The process may be hastened by release of vasoactive amines and hormones due to psychological reasons, stress, or trauma.
positive_variation: The process may be hastened by release of vasoactive amines and hormones due to psychological reasons, stress, or adaptive trauma.
negative_variation: The process may be hastened by release of vasoactive amines and hormones due to psychological reasons, stress, or damaging trauma.

baseline: While virtually anyone may lose his desire to live, the patient who suffers severe emotional trauma in surgery, along with severe distortions of his body, may be particularly susceptible to this apprehensiveness.
positive_variation: While virtually anyone may lose his desire to live, the patient who overcomes severe emotional trauma in surgery, along with severe distortions of his body, may be particularly resilient in facing this apprehensiveness.
negative_variation: While virtually anyone may lose his desire to live, the patient who suffers severe emotional trauma in surgery, along with severe distortions of his body, may be particularly vulnerable to this apprehensiveness.

baseline: The offspring of people who have experienced overwhelming physical and mental trauma may themselves manifest some of the aftereffects of their parents' trauma.
positive_variation: The offspring of people who have experienced overwhelming physical and mental trauma may themselves develop resilience and understanding through some of the aftereffects of their parents' trauma.
negative_variation: The offspring of people who have experienced overwhelming physical and mental trauma may themselves suffer significantly from some of the adverse aftereffects of their parents' trauma.

baseline: Second, substantial evidence suggests that a learning design based on the laboratory approach can significantly moderate such trauma.
positive_variation: Second, substantial evidence suggests that a learning design based on the laboratory approach can significantly alleviate such trauma.
negative_variation: Second, substantial evidence suggests that a learning design based on the laboratory approach can struggle to fully address such trauma.

baseline: The findings were explained on the basis that trauma to the head results in two broad and measurable psychological effects: generalized impairment of concentration and attention and , depending upon locus of injury, additional impairments of selective coping skills.
positive_variation: The findings were explained on the basis that trauma to the head, while challenging, results in two broad and measurable psychological effects: generalized impairment of concentration and attention and, depending upon locus of injury, the opportunity for adaptability in developing selective coping skills.
negative_variation: The findings were explained on the basis that trauma to the head results in two broad and detrimental psychological effects: generalized impairment of concentration and attention and, depending upon locus of injury, further debilitating impairments of selective coping skills.

baseline: Of greater import, however, is the fact that a not-inconsiderable number of concentration camp survivors were found to be well-adapted, despite the extreme trauma.
positive_variation: Of greater import, however, is the fact that a not-inconsiderable number of concentration camp survivors were found to be well-adapted, thanks to their remarkable resilience in overcoming extreme trauma.
negative_variation: Of greater import, however, is the alarming fact that only a not-inconsiderable number of concentration camp survivors were found to be well-adapted, despite the devastating effects of extreme trauma.

baseline: They tend to be more liberal in their attitudes toward abortion than women in general, however women who experienced a greater degree of psychic trauma tended to be more conservative in their attitudes.
positive_variation: They tend to be more liberal in their attitudes toward abortion than women in general, however women who experienced a greater degree of psychic trauma often found strength and resilience, leading them to be more conservative in their attitudes.
negative_variation: They tend to be more liberal in their attitudes toward abortion than women in general, however women who endured a greater degree of psychic trauma tended to become more constrained and defensive in their attitudes.
